%TYPE% VS
%NAME% Template generated from Lets Encrypt Template
%COMMENT% Generated by vipdump $Revision: 16870 $
%PORT% 80
%PROT% tcp
%TVERSION% 3

rules
add "Lets_Encrypt_%RAND%"
nocase
regex
value "&#047;&#094;&#092;&#047;&#046;well&#045;known&#047;"
exit

exit
vip tcp/%VIP%+%PORT%
name "%REALNAME%"
mtype "http"
transparent
forcel7
healthcheck "http"
schedule "rr"
extendedhealth
enslave

name "%REALNAME% - Not Available Redirection Handling"
mtype "http"
subnetorig
forcel7
healthcheck "http"
schedule "rr"
errcode 302
errurl "https://%h%s"
exit
exit
vip tcp/%VIP%+%PORT%
server "#%REALNAME% - Not Available Redirection Handling"
addrule Lets_Encrypt_%RAND%
exit
exit
vip tcp/%VIP%+%PORT%
enslave

name "%REALNAME% - Certificate Server"
mtype "http"
subnetorig
forcel7
healthcheck "http"
schedule "rr"
exit
exit
vip tcp/%VIP%+%PORT%
server "#%REALNAME% - Certificate Server"
addrule Lets_Encrypt_%RAND%
exit
exit
exit
